flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Write with a pen that costs hundreds of dollars, on the cheap. The Pilot G-2 pen will hold a Mont Blanc ink cartridge. All you need is a single edge razor. Just take off 1/8 from the plastic end of the refill cartridge and slip it into the Pilot case. Screw it shut. Your done.
guide.introduction_rendered: Write with a pen that costs hundreds of dollars, on the cheap. The Pilot G-2 pen will hold a Mont Blanc ink cartridge. All you need is a single edge razor. Just take off 1/8 from the plastic end of the refill cartridge and slip it into the Pilot case. Screw it shut. Your done.
guide.summary: Mont Blanc pens cost hundreds of dollars. I can't afford that. However, the refill cartridge for a Felt Liner only cost $7. Luckily for me, it fits into my Pilot G-2 pen with a simple nip off the plastic end.
guide.title: $1 pen + $7 refill cartridge > $300 Writing instrument
